data.market_trends: There is a growing trend towards sustainable travel, particularly among younger demographics causing an upsurge in eco-friendly travel packages.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers prefer personalized experiences over cookie-cutter tours, influencing the types of offerings that agencies should promote.
data.competitive_landscape: Guatemala is carving out a niche against more heavily marketed destinations by promoting lesser-known attractions and local experiences.
data.seasonal_factors: Travel peaks during the dry season from November to February, influencing pricing and availability.
